mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.app_name as "appName",a.app_code as "appCode",a.app_type as "appType",a.remark,a.resource_url as "resource_url" FROM sys_role_app ra LEFT JOIN sys_application a on ra.app_id = a.id WHERE ra.role_id = #{param.roleId} and ra.project_id = #{param.projectId} order by a.create_time
